title: go-mode: Leave indent-tabs-mode alone by default
body:
by **andrew.pennebaker**: 
Currently, go-mode modifies indent-tabs-mode for Go code buffers. It's perhaps more
idiomatic in Emacs to leave this variable alone and let the user specify a go-mode-hook
in his ~/.emacs. If the user prefers to use a different value of indent-tabs-mode, he
will have to do this anyway.
